problem.markdown:
1. Better reliability can be observed in distribution system with
() Radial type network (x) Ring type network () Same in both type of network () All
2. Sectionaliser can
(x) Close on but cannot break load () Break but cannot close on load () Break and close on load () Neither can break or close on load
3. The final operation of the recloser for a close in permanent fault is
(x) Lockout operation () Last reclosing time () 3rd reclosing time () Last curve operating time
4. Generally single phase loads having transformers have the following type of fuse as main protection.
() Anyone of them () H type (x) K type () T type
5. Consider 5P20 class CT ratio:1000/1, Normal rated current of 900 A. Consider a overloading of 10 % while calculating plug setting of the relay with IEC SI curve. Let the initial set TMS be 0.1. Relay settings has ranges for PSM of 50% to 200% in steps of 25% and TMS setting range of 0.1 to 1.1 in step of 0.05. The operating time for a three phase fault of 15 kA is (Hint: Calculate PS, then calculate the operating time using the curve characteristics equation)
() 0.151 () 0.353 (x) 0.252 () 0.454
problem.p: 1. Better reliability can be observed in distribution system with

choicegroup.choice: Same in both type of network
Close on but cannot break load
Break but cannot close on load
Neither can break or close on load

problem.p: 3. The final operation of the recloser for a close in permanent fault is
4. Generally single phase loads having transformers have the following type of fuse as main protection.

The operating time for a three phase fault of 15 kA is (Hint: Calculate PS, then calculate the operating time using the curve characteristics equation)
